problem_text:
Describe the automorphisms of the Sylow p-subgroup of a Chevalley group of normal type over Z/p^m Z, m ⩾ 2, where p is a prime.
V. M. Levchuk
answer: Described in (S. G. Kolesnikov, Algebra and Logic, 43, no. 1 (2004), 17–33); Izv. Gomel’ Univ., 36, no. 3 (2006), 137–146 (Russian); J. Math. Sci., New York, 152 (2008), 220–246).
